description.en: Large town with all the facilities you might need. The tourist office can be found east of the old casino.
description.fr: Large town with all the facilities you might need. The tourist office can be found east of the old casino.

accommodationDescription.en: Most hotels in Hendaye can be found close to the beach. There are many campgrounds to the east. There a couple of options close to the railway station.
accommodationDescription.fr: La plupart des hôtels de Hendaye se trouvent près de la plage. Il y a beaucoup de terrains de camping à l'est. Il y a quelques options près de la gare.

description.en: Turn right for Biriatou. There is a waterpoint at the public toilets.
description.fr: Turn right for Biriatou.

accommodationDescription.en: The Basque village of Biriatou is situated on the side of Xoldokogaina (486m). Look out for events held on the pelota pitch.
accommodationDescription.fr: Le village basque de Biriatou est situé du côté de Xoldokogaina (486m). Surveillez les événements organisés sur le terrain de la pelote.

accommodations.name: Les Jardins de Bakea
accommodations.description:
The Jardins De Bakea is located in Biriatou, next to the Spanish border. It offers accommodation with a traditional Basque décor and free Wi-Fi access.
Guest rooms at the Jardins Hotel are equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms also have a balcony that overlooks the Bidassoa Valley.
The Bakea’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine with regional specialities. There is also a bar and guests are invited to relax on the garden terrace.

name: Turn right for the Intermarché Supermarket

description.en: Turn right onto the Boulevard de l'Emperor for the Intermarché Supermarket (15 minutes) which sells original and easy-clic camping gas
description.fr: Turn right onto the Boulevard de l'Emperor for the Intermarché Supermarket (15 minutes) which sells original and easy-clic camping gas

description.en: The border between France and Spain runs through Col d'Ibardin. You will find many restaurants and supermarkets at Spanish prices.
description.fr: La frontière entre la France et l'Espagne traverse le Col d'Ibardin. Vous trouverez de nombreux restaurants et supermarchés aux prix espagnols.

accommodationDescription.en: The border between France and Spain runs through Col d'Ibardin. You will find many restaurants and supermarkets at Spanish prices.
accommodationDescription.fr: La frontière entre la France et l'Espagne traverse le Col d'Ibardin. Vous trouverez de nombreux restaurants et supermarchés aux prix espagnols.

description.en: There are two gîtes and one hotel
description.fr: Il y a deux gîte d'etapes et un hôtel

accommodationDescription.en: There are two gites and one hotel. The Gîte Manttu-Baita is located next to the GR10 path. The hotel restaurant Trabenia can be found further down the road next to the main road.
accommodationDescription.fr: Il y a deux gîte d'etapes et un hôtel. Le Gîte Manttu-Baita est situé à côté du sentier GR10. Le restaurant de l'hôtel Trabenia se trouve plus loin sur la route principale.

accommodations.name: B&B Gypsie
accommodations.description: B&B Gypsie offers a garden with a furnished terrace and barbecue facilities.

description.en: Tourist office, campground and many small shops. There is a bus service from Sare to St-Jean-de-Luz.
description.fr: Ravitaillement, camping, distributeur d'argent, pharmacie, route et bus vers St-Jean-de-Luz

accommodationDescription.en: Tourist office, campground and many small shops. There is a bus service from Sare to St-Jean-de-Luz.
accommodationDescription.fr: Ravitaillement, camping, distributeur d'argent, pharmacie, route et bus vers St-Jean-de-Luz.

description.en: Turn right for La Petite Rhune campsite, Hotel Pikasaria
description.fr: La Petite Rhune campsite, Hôtel Pikasaria

description.en: Hego Alde Gîte et Chambres d'hôtes à Sare
description.fr: Hego Alde Gîte et Chambres d'hôtes à Sare

accommodationDescription.en: The GR10 passes right in front of the house. This gite can be found approximately 3km from Sare and 9km before Ainhoa.
accommodationDescription.fr: Le GR10 passe juste devant la maison. Ce gîte se trouve à environ 3 km de Sare et 9 km avant Ainhoa.

description.en: Ventà Berrouet is a resturant snack bar. Open everyday 7h to 20h.
description.fr: La station service reste ouverte tous jours de 7h a 20h

description.en: Tourist village. There are no large supermarkets but you will be able to buy local Basque produce. There is a waterpoint at the public toilets.
description.fr: Tourist village. There are no large supermarkets but you will be able to buy local Basque produce. There is a waterpoint at the public toilets.

accommodationDescription.en: Tourist village. There are no large supermarkets but you will be able to buy local Basque produce.
accommodationDescription.fr: Un village touristique. Il n'y a pas de grands supermarchés mais vous pourrez acheter des produits basques locaux.

description.en: The small family campsite is located 150m north-west of the village center of Ainhoa, open from early April to late September.
description.fr: à 150m au nord-ouest du centre du village d'Ainhoa, ouvert de début avril à fin septembre.

description.en: Follow the sign to Venta Burkaitz. A bar-restaurant with accommodation available. Check opening times because it may only be open in summer.
description.fr: Follow the sign to Venta Burkaitz. A bar-restaurant with accommodation available. Check opening times because it may only be open in summer.

accommodationDescription.en: Venta Burkaitz is a bar-restaurant with accommodation available. Check opening times because it may only be open in summer.
accommodationDescription.fr: Venta Burkaitz est un bar-restaurant avec hébergement disponible. Vérifiez les heures d'ouverture, car il ne peut être ouvert en été.

accommodationDescription.en: The Gite Urrizate is situated next to the GR10 path just before reaching Bidarray.
accommodationDescription.fr: Le Gite Urrizate est situé à côté du GR10 juste avant Bidarray.

description.en: There is a waterpoint outside the church. The train station can be found down by the river. Camping Amestoya is 2km north of Bidarray
description.fr: There is a waterpoint outside the church. The train station can be found down by the river. Camping Amestoya is 2km north of Bidarray

accommodationDescription.en:
There is a train station that connects to Bayonne and Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port. Some accommodation can be found on the other side of the river Nive, such as the Le Chalet d'Iparla (1.4km from the GR10). Call ahead and they might come to pick you up.

If you have the time, then visit Noblia bridge which spans the Nive. The legend tells it was built by witches, which is why it's locally referred to as the "the Bridge of Hell"
accommodationDescription.fr:
Il y a une gare qui relie Bayonne et Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port. Certains hébergements peuvent être fiers de l'autre côté de la Nive, comme le Chalet d'Iparla (à 1,4km du GR10). Appelez à l'avance et ils pourraient venir vous chercher. 

Si vous avez le temps, alors visitez le pont Noblia qui enjambe la Nive. La légende raconte qu'il a été construit par les sorcières, ce qui explique pourquoi il est appelé localement le «pont de l'enfer»

description.en: Tourist office. Turn left up Behereko Karrika for the Intermarché supermarket and campground. Continue west along the river for hôtel Arcé, hôtel Juantorena and Gite Gaineko Karrikan
description.fr: Tourist office. Turn left up Behereko Karrika for the Intermarché supermarket and campground. Continue west along the river for hôtel Arcé, hôtel Juantorena and Gite Gaineko Karrikan

accommodationDescription.en: Tourist information center. Bakery Irastorza (closed on weekends). The Intermarche supermarket and campground are situated north of the tourist office. For the hotels and gites continue over the bridge that crosses the Nive des Aldudes.
accommodationDescription.fr: Centre d'information touristique. Boulangerie Irastorza (fermé le week-end). Le supermarché Intermarché et le camping sont situés au nord de l'office de tourisme. Pour les hôtels et les gîtes, continuez sur le pont qui traverse La Nive des Aldudes.

description.en: You will pass restaurant Lespade shortly before arriving in Lasse. Turn right at the crossroads for Gîte de groupe de la Cidrerie Aldakurria
description.fr: You will pass restaurant Lespade shortly before arriving in Lasse. Turn right at the crossroads for Gîte de groupe de la Cidrerie Aldakurria

accommodationDescription.en: Lasse is a small hamlet centered around a crossroad. It is located 2.5 kms before reaching the large town of Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port. If you want a quieter night then Lasse is the better option.
accommodationDescription.fr: Lasse est un petit hameau centré autour d'un carrefour. Il est situé à 2,5 km avant d'atteindre la grande ville de Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port. Si vous voulez passer une nuit tranquille, Lasse est la meilleure option.

accommodations.name: Gîte de groupe de la Cidrerie Aldakurria

description.en:
Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port is also a starting point for pilgrims travelling the Camino de Santiago. Also know as, The Way of St James. Look out for the scallop shells that are used as way markers for the Camino. Spend an evening with some of the pilgrims discussing what the shell represents and gloat about how much tougher the GR10 is to walk than the Camino. 

Monday is market day with sheep and cattle driven into the town.. At 5pm, there is a communal game of bare-handed pelote at the fronton.

 There are many accommodation options, tourist office and two supermarkets. The train station connects with Bayonne.
description.fr:
Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port est aussi un point de départ pour la traversée du Camino de Santiago. Aussi connu comme le chemin de St James. Faites attention aux coquilles de pétoncles qui servent de marqueurs au Camino. Passez une soirée avec quelques pèlerins discutant de ce que représente la coquille.

Lundi est le jour du marché avec des moutons et du bétail conduit dans la ville.

accommodationDescription.en:
Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port is also a starting point for pilgrims travelling the Camino de Santiago. Also know as, The Way of St James. Look out for the scallop shells that are used as way markers for the Camino. Spend an evening with some of the pilgrims discussing what the shells represent and gloat about how much tougher the GR10 is to walk than the Camino. 

Monday is market day with sheep and cattle driven into the town. At 5pm, there is a communal game of bare-handed pelote at the fronton.

There are many accommodation options, tourist office and two supermarkets. The train station connects with Bayonne.
accommodationDescription.fr:
Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port est aussi un point de départ pour la traversée du Camino de Santiago. Aussi connu comme le chemin de St James. Faites attention aux coquilles de pétoncles qui servent de marqueurs au Camino. Passez une soirée avec quelques pèlerins discutant de ce que représente la coquille.

Lundi est le jour du marché avec des moutons et du bétail conduit dans la ville.

accommodationDescription.en: The small village of Caro is on the GR10, approximately 3km after leaving Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port. The Maison Florenia is the closest accommodation to the GR10 trail.
accommodationDescription.fr: Le petit village de Caro est sur le GR10, environ 3 km après avoir quitté Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port. La Maison Florenia est l'hébergement le plus proche du sentier GR10.

description.en: Water opposite the Auberge Carricaburu.
description.fr: Water opposite the Auberge Carricaburu.

accommodationDescription.en: Estérençuby has a couple of hotel-restaurants. The hotel Andreinia Logis can be reached by crossing the bridge over the Nive de Béhérobie.
accommodationDescription.fr: Estérençuby a quelques hôtels-restaurants. L'Hôtel Andreinia Logis peut être atteint en traversant le pont sur la Nive de Béhérobie.

description.en: Camping is possible
description.fr: Le bivouac y est possible - Location de tentes à la demande.

accommodationDescription.en: The gîte Kaskoleta is located on the plateau Phalgacette next to the GR10. Ask permission if you want to camp here.
accommodationDescription.fr: Le gîte d´étape Kaskoleta situé sur le plateau de Phalgacette jouit d´une situation privilégiée sur l´étape du GR10 menant de St jean Pied de Port aux chalets d´Iraty.

description.en: Camping is possible here a short distance west of the trail.
description.fr: Camping is possible here a short distance west of the trail.

description.en: Continue along the D18 to Snack Bar Chalet de Cize. Otherwise turn right for Iraty
description.fr: Continue along the D18 to Snack Bar Chalet de Cize. Otherwise turn right for Iraty

name: Exit for 'Aire Naturelle De Camping D'Iraty'

description.en: A bar-restaurant with a small shop. Camping is possible
description.fr: A bar-restaurant with a small shop. Camping is possible

description.en: A bar-restaurant
description.fr: A bar-restaurant

accommodationDescription.en: There is only one option of accommodation at Logibar, the Auberge Logibar. However, it is located next to the D26 road so it may be possible to hitch to Larrau, 2.5km west of Logibar. In Larrau there is a gite, campground and a couple of hotels.
accommodationDescription.fr: Il n'y a qu'une seule option d'hébergement au Logibar, l'Auberge Logibar. Cependant, il est situé à côté de la route D26, il est donc possible de se rendre à Larrau, à 2,5 km à l'ouest de Logibar. À Larrau, il y a un gîte, un terrain de camping et quelques hôtels.

name: Pont suspendu sur les Gorges d'Olhadubi

description.en: Open all year round. Camping is possible
description.fr: Open all year round. Camping is possible

description.fr: Open from June to Septmember. Demi-pension Adultes (à partir de 13 ans) : 40 €/pers. Nuitée: 15 €/pers. Repas: 17 €/pers. Petit-déjeuner: 8€/pers.

description.en: Cauterets is a spa town and a major tourist resort. You should be able to find all the facilities that you require. Numerous gites. Several campsites located north os the town. There are bus connections to Lourdes, luz-Saint-Sauveur and Gavarnie
description.fr: Cauterets is a spa town and a major tourist resort. You should be able to find all the facilities that you require. Numerous gites. Several campsites located north os the town. There are bus connections to Lourdes, luz-Saint-Sauveur and Gavarnie

accommodationDescription.en: Mérens-les-Vals has a train station on the Latour-de-Carol and Toulouse line. The large town of Ax-les-Thermes is 9km to the north which can be reached by train.
accommodationDescription.fr: Mérens-les-Vals possède une gare sur la ligne Latour-de-Carol et Toulouse. La grande ville d'Ax-les-Thermes se trouve à 9 km au nord, accessible en train.
